sen.j: 野原海水浴場（のはらかいすいよくじょう）は、京都府舞鶴市の日本海に面する海水浴場。
sen.e: Nohara Kaisui Yokujo (Nohara Seaside Resort) is a seaside resort facing the Sea of Japan located in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Nohara Kaisui Yokujo (Nohara Seaside Resort) is a seaside resort facing the Sea of Japan, located in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Nohara Kaisui Yokujo (Nohara Seaside Resort) is a seaside resort facing the Sea of Japan, located in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Features
Features
Features

sen.j: 大浦半島の西にある遠浅の白浜で、非常に波が穏やかで比較的泳ぎやすい海水浴場である。
sen.e: It is a white shallow beach located on the west side of Oura Peninsula, and its very gentle waves make it relatively easy to swim.
It is a beach of white sand where the sea is shallow, located on the west side of Oura Peninsula, and its very gentle waves make it relatively easy to swim.
sen.cmt: 「white shallow beach」→「beach of white sand where the sea is shallow」
sen.e: It is a beach of white sand where the sea is shallow, located on the west side of Oura Peninsula, and its very gentle waves make it relatively easy to swim.

sen.j: また一帯は若狭湾国定公園に指定され、沖合いの島々が望める豊かな自然が魅力的である。
sen.e: Its neighborhood is designated as Wakasa Wan Quasi-National Park blessed with rich natural environment and great scenery of many islands on the sea.
Its neighborhood is designated as Wakasa Wan Quasi-National Park, which is blessed with a rich natural environment and has great views of the many islands on the sea.
sen.cmt: 「, which is」挿入,「a」挿入,「has」挿入,「the」挿入, 「on」→「in」
sen.e: Its neighborhood is designated as Wakasa Bay Quasi-National Park, which is blessed with a rich natural environment and has great views of the many islands on the sea.
The beach opens on July 2nd every year.
The beach opens on July 2nd every year.
The beach opens on July 2 every year.
sen.cmt: 月日の表現を修正しました。

sen.e: Access
Access
Access

sen.j: JR東舞鶴駅から野原行きのバスで43分。
sen.e: From JR Higashi-Maizuru Station, it takes 43 minutes by bus bound for Nobara.
From JR Higashi-Maizuru Station it takes 43 minutes by bus bound for Nobara.
From JR Higashi-Maizuru Station it takes forty-three minutes by bus bound for Nohara.

sen.j: 京都駅から特別急行列車まいづるに乗り、約1時間30分で東舞鶴駅着。
sen.e: From Kyoto Station, Limited Express Maizuru takes you to Higashi-Maizuru Station in approximately 90 minutes.
From Kyoto Station, the Limited Express Maizuru takes you to Higashi-Maizuru Station in approximately 90 minutes.
From Kyoto Station, the Limited Express Maizuru takes you to Higashi-Maizuru Station in approximately 90 minutes.

sen.j: 舞鶴若狭自動車道舞鶴東インターチェンジから大浦半島方面。
sen.e: From the exit at Higashimaizuru Interchange of Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, drive headed for Oura Peninsula.
From the Higashimaizuru Interchange on the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, drive towards Oura Peninsula.
From the Higashi-Maizuru Interchange on the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, drive towards Oura Peninsula.
